channel.title: Comments on: Iggy Pop wants you to buy insurance

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: my bad, Royal Caribbean International, apparently.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I guess. I didn't really catch the name of the company, I just felt sad/embarrassed for iggy pop. Then again, he sold himself out years ago when he whore'd out Lust for Life to Carnival cruise lines, so why not car insurance, I suppose. To his credit he's fit for a geezer and has been for decades. Cryogenics?
item.content:encoded: I guess. I didn’t really catch the name of the company, I just felt sad/embarrassed for iggy pop. Then again, he sold himself out years ago when he whore’d out Lust for Life to Carnival cruise lines, so why not car insurance, I suppose. To his credit he’s fit for a geezer and has been for decades. Cryogenics?

item.title: By: Paul
item.dc:creator: Paul
item.description: I think the idea is to get people talking about the company... seems to have worked.
item.content:encoded: I think the idea is to get people talking about the company… seems to have worked.
